relation: Great for these types of students
I feel very safe and secure in the location of the campus.
ULM is great for students devoted to their education.
The affordability of this college is the main reason I considered it in the first place. They reward hard work.
Just exploring the campus is fun to me. The fitness center offers may free activities as well. In addition, the city of Monroe has almost anything you could want for entertainment.
This university has a very wide variety of food selections.
You get what you pay for, but overall, on-campus living at ULM is nicer than that of nearby colleges.
Apply early, and visit the campus.
This college is very helpful for prospective students. They provide all of the information you could need, without waiting until the last minute. Also, the campus is beautiful.
pageTitle: University of Louisiana at Monroe Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {231993=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 50037=There are always activities to participate in. ULM is home to a nationally rank ski team and it is fun to watch the team skiing on the bayou. During Spring Fever, you can play Ooz Ball (volleyball in the mud), attend music concerts and other activities. The 2012 Spring Fever concert featured The Fray.}

textAfterTable: Tips for prospective students I transferred here from Arkansas and I have to admit it is very different. It is actually a home away from home You can get comfortable and have small things to keep you occupied meaning getting your mind off home sickness. Login to rate or flag the reviews LaBrittany from Junction City, AR 11/01/2010 Reviewer is A current student here. 5 out of 5 people found this review useful. 3 of 57 Categories Comments Great for these types of students ULM is GREAT for all types of students! It is so diverse and there is always something for everybody! Tips for prospective students College is a great experience... just do not forget why you are here. Reading in your textbooks is a major bonus. Also, utilize your teacher/professor's office hours. (: Bang for the buck It is definitely a bang for your buck. You get access to everything: activity center, student success center,
